mapper.insert: insert into three ( id, accountid, threeplat, threeid, threenick, gender, avatar ) values (#{id}, #{accountid}, #{threeplat}, #{threeid}, #{threenick}, #{gender}, #{avatar})
insert into three ( id, accountid, threeplat, threeid, threenick, gender, avatar ) values (#{id}, #{accountid}, #{threeplat}, #{threeid}, #{threenick}, #{gender}, #{avatar})
